title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2014 - London, UK
description:
The London Software Craftsmanship Community are looking to run five code retreats for the GDCR. Most have a maximum capacity of 25 people. 
Please do not register here. Sign up on the London Software Craftsmanship Community (http://www.meetup.com/london-software-craftsmanship/) website instead.
